cards.name: Net Promoter Score - Tasks
cards.description: Net Promoter Score is the difference between "Agree" responses and "Disagree" responses as a percentage of total responses.

Task Type: In the past week, Copilot helped me with the following tasks: \[(.+)\]

cards.name: Net Promoter Score - Activity
cards.description: Net Promoter Score is the difference between "Agree" responses and "Disagree" responses as a percentage of total responses.

native.query:
SELECT
    sum(
        CASE
            WHEN "Survey Question - Question"."question" = 'Based on your experience, estimate how much total coding time you saved using copilot for this PR? (in minutes)' THEN (
                "public"."survey_QuestionResponse"."response" :: float
            ) / 60
            WHEN "Survey Question - Question"."question" = 'On average how many hours per day did you save in the past week?' THEN (
                "public"."survey_QuestionResponse"."response" :: float
            ) * 5
        END
    ) AS "Total Time Saved"
FROM
    "public"."survey_QuestionResponse"
    LEFT JOIN "public"."survey_SurveyQuestionAssociation" "Survey SurveyQuestionAssociation - SurveyQuestion" ON "public"."survey_QuestionResponse"."surveyQuestion" = "Survey SurveyQuestionAssociation - SurveyQuestion"."id"
    LEFT JOIN "public"."survey_Survey" "Survey Survey - Survey" ON "Survey SurveyQuestionAssociation - SurveyQuestion"."survey" = "Survey Survey - Survey"."id"
    LEFT JOIN "public"."survey_Question" "Survey Question - Question" ON "Survey SurveyQuestionAssociation - SurveyQuestion"."question" = "Survey Question - Question"."id"
WHERE
    (
        "Survey Survey - Survey"."typeDetail" = 'AI Transformation'
        AND (
            "Survey Question - Question"."question" = 'Based on your experience, estimate how much total coding time you saved using copilot for this PR? (in minutes)'
            OR "Survey Question - Question"."question" = 'On average how many hours per day did you save in the past week?'
        )
        [[AND "Survey Survey - Survey"."name" = <<survey_name>>]]
    )
